content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_python_file" command to run the script "my_script.py". Then, I used the "browse_website" command to gather information about Python from Wikipedia. The "get_text_summary" command was used to get an overview of Python's history, features, syntax, and implementations. I wrote test cases for the "add" and "subtract" functions using the "write_tests" command. The "execute_shell" command was used to list the files in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/". I analyzed some code and removed an undefined variable using the "analyze_code" command. I wrote, read, appended, and replaced text in a file using the "write_to_file", "read_file", "append_to_file", and "replace_in_file" commands. Finally, I used the "list_files" command to get a list of files in the directory and the "delete_file" command to delete a file named "my_file.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "favorite_books.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: My favorite books:\n\n1. To Kill a Mockingbird by Harper Lee\n2. 1984 by George Orwell\n3. The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald\n4. Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen\n5. The Catcher in the Rye by J.D. Salinger', type='action_result')]
"""
